title: List of Current Ranged Champions for Missions!
body:
Hey guys,

We've seen some questions around the mission " Teamwork - Close Combat" and which champions you can and can't use. 

"Win a game with no ranged champions on your team."

So, I've got the list of champions that are considered ranged for you to reference if you need it. The following champions won't count toward progressing this mission:

Ahri
Anivia
Annie
Ashe
Aurelion Sol
Azir
Bard
Brand
Caitlyn
Cassiopeia
Corki
Draven
Elise
Ezreal
FiddleSticks
Gnar
Graves
Heimerdinger
Janna
Jayce
Jhin
Jinx
Kalista
Karma
Karthus
Kennen
Kindred
KogMaw

Lucian
Lulu

Velkoz
Viktor
Vladimir
Xayah
Xerath
Ziggs
Zilean
Zyra

replies.body: completed the mission with ez.I had my premade team of darius,shyvana,fiora,master yi,garen and tahmn.THe enemy team surrendered in 1 minute lol
id surrender too if i was against 6 champs lol
:DDDDDD
Thanks Holly!
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
The fact that people needed this list is kind of sad.

{{champion:126}} {{champion:60}} {{champion:76}} 
To be fair, these were questionable and the clarification helps.

Please excuse the spelling, I just typed it up quickly.
That moment when you realize that you have no friends.{{sticker:sg-ahri-1}}
FYI no more group missions for rewards pls. You alienate so many players with this crap.
So Thresh is not ranged?
Thresh is ranged.
Is kayle  considered ranged?
She's not on the list, so apparently not.
My friends and I also did not complete the mission.. we used Cho'Gath, Morde, Akali, Blitzcrank and Jarvan.
Did you equip the championship icon?
Inb4 people learning now that Thresh and Rakan are ranged :D
So Rakan and Thresh can buy Runaan´s?
Well everyone can but the affect is ranged only and both can use it's affect.
Need a team for do this mission! add and invite me!
Hey are u down to do it?
add me
Qyy
It is always a pain in the ass to get 5 people together during the week. When you got to spend Friday to Saturday somewhere else...
how is rakan range champ??????
The range of the autoattack. Rakan has an attack range of 300 and melee champions without abilities have an attack range of 175 or less.
Does it have to be a 5 pre made?
Yes
Me and my group of 5 did the quest with all non ranged champions but we didn't complete the quest. Can someone please explain. https://gyazo.com/f6de9d8f1928c4572cc11d3818289cd2
did you have your worlds icons on?
yes
I can't tell why from your screenshot. Go ahead and submit a ticket with a link to the match so they can investigate.
Does a "game" count if Twisted Treeline is played? I feel like Twisted Treeline gets shafted nearly all the time.
Only if you can play as a "5 person premade group" in a 3v3 map :)
Are you sure this is a good mission, it will only make people more troll
or you could list the champs that do..

Hi Holly. I just completed this mission with a 5 man premade. Our team was Nunu, Tryndamere, Sejuani, Ekko, and Galio. We won the PVP match (it was draft pick normal) but none of us received credit toward the mission. I had a worlds icon equipped as well. I earned progress toward the other missions involving the dragons and kda but not this one. Is there something I'm missing? I even tried logging in and out a couple times to see if it would update but that didn't work either.
I'm not sure why the mission wouldn't have progressed. Feel free to write in a ticket and shoot them a link to the game so they can investigate.
Me and my friends just finished the 5 man without ranged but we did not get the challenge, our team was Mord, Blitz, Galio, Warwick and Garen
I'm not sure what happened. Feel free to submit a ticket and we can investigate.

I'm surprised that list of ranged was more practical than list of melee, but I'm not counting them to see which is *actually* the bigger list.

Still, I see jayce and nid count as ranged which was the only somewhat ambiguous ones that'd I'd wondered if maybe simply ending the game in their melee form might be enough to trick the system, but looks like you're on top of it.
i need a team to do the mission someone?{{sticker:sg-ahri-1}}
add me
Make some friends ;p
